q: it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Joel Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said.`` You win games with stops more than making shots. I thought Kenyon Martin was the star of the game.'' JR Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a

A Familiar User Experience' In announcing the online version, CEO Steve Ballmer said Dynamics CRM is an industry leader because it gives sales professionals a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, and streamlines processes and access to real-time data. The familiarity of the user experience is derived from the use of what Microsoft describes as a`` next-generation native Microsoft Outlook client.''
